definition: a legal process intended to insure equality among the creditors of a corporation declared to be insolvent
details:
noun
- a legal process intended to insure equality among the creditors of a corporation declared to be insolvent
- inability to discharge all your debts as they come due
= example: inability to discharge all your debts as they come due
= synonyms: failure
- a state of complete lack of some abstract property
= example: a state of complete lack of some abstract property
